subject: United States Open (Golf)
Golf
lead_paragraph: After two rounds, Tiger Woods, Jim Furyk and David Toms were the only players in the field of 156 under par at the Lake Course, sharing the 36-hole lead at one-under 139.
snippet: After two rounds, Tiger Woods, Jim Furyk and David Toms were the only players in the field of 156 under par at the Lake Course, sharing the 36-hole lead at one-under 139.
